page.title: 17SOCIAL SURVEY (CONEY HALL)
page.content: WE STARTED OFF COMPILING QUESTIONS WE COMPILED SOME AND THEN WE TRIED THEM OUT ON OUR PARENTS. WE FOUND OUT THAT A FEW WERE WORDED WRONGLY SO WE CHANGED THEM THEN WE TRIED THEM OUT ON PEOPLE ACROSS THE ROAD,STILL SOME WERE A BIT PERSONAL BUT WE CHANGED THEM SO THEY WERE O.K. THEN WE HAD TO WRITE A LETTER TO THE RESIDENTS OF CONEY HALL MARK BARNES ONE WAS THE BEST AND HIS GOT PICKED WE PRINTED THE LETTER AND ON FRIDAY SIX PUPILS WENT OUT AND DELIVERED A HUNDRED LEAFLETS TO CONEY HALL. THE TUESDAY AFTER WARDS WE WENT THERE DETERMINED TO GET AT LEAST FIFTY ANSWER SHEETS.WE DID GET FIFTY ANSWER SHEETS AND THESE ARE THE RESULTS . AS WE ARE ONLY 9 OR 10 THE RESULTS ARE NOT TOO DETAILED. CONEY HALL CONSISTS OF OLDER RESIDENTS BECAUSE NOT VERY MANY HOUSE HOLDERS HAD CHILDREN. IT SEEMS AS THOUGH MOST
